text: Somewhere Beyond Love () is a 1974 Italian drama movie directed by Luigi Comencini and starring Giuliano Gemma, Stefania Sandrelli, Brizio Montinaro, Renato Scarpa, Cesira Abbiati, Rina Franchetti, Emilio Bonucci. == Other websites == * Category:1974 drama movies Category:Italian drama movies Category:Movies directed by Luigi Comencini
title: Somewhere Beyond Love
